thread.title: george lestrange
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by george lestrange

author: george lestrange
title: george lestrange
text: Justin at the counter was great. you guys had the tires I needed that no one else around had. nothing like good local inventory. they did a great job and had me in and out within an hour or so. Justin was good in all aspects of service and knew everything about the tires you were offering, and I would recommend their business to anyone
